activities: Insight performs storage and access of employee human resources data for payroll, benefit and staff management, audit, compliance/regulatory, ethical and legal purposes.  Insight may also capture personal data about consumers, customers, contractors or suppliers in the course of conducting business with them, through its information systems and other avenues of communication, in accordance with the applicable law of the relevant country.  You will be told the purpose for which the information is collected and used when you are asked to provide the information or soon thereafter.
personaldata: Consumer, client, supplier and human resources data
recoursemech: Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland (FDPIC)
